thread.title: Truck driver injured in rollover crash in Orland Park - Daily Southtown
thread.title_full: Truck driver injured in rollover crash in Orland Park - Daily Southtown

author: Frank Vaisvilas
title: Truck driver injured in rollover crash in Orland Park - Daily Southtown
text:
A truck driver sustained non-life-threatening injuries during a rollover crash in Orland Park Saturday morning, authorities said.
The driver was working at a construction site at the southwest corner of LaGrange Road and 159th Street where the accident occurred about 10 a.m., according to a news release.
Orland Fire Protection District Battalion Chief Nick Cinquepalmi said the driver of the dump truck was pinned inside the cabin but was extricated by emergency responders and was taken to Silver Cross Hospital in New Lenox.
